Klayton has been writing an entire album of instrumental music for Film/TV/Video
Games (as well as for all you DJs, Fans & Critics), simultaneously as he has
been writing the new Celldweller sophomore album. He recently decided that he
had amassed enough content for this project to give it a name and share it with
the rest of us. The album is entitled Soundtrack For The Voices In My Head Vol.
01, and is primarily instrumental and score based, showing a progression of
